Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class DivinityDecoratorWithEffects

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.DivinityDecoratorWithEffects
All Implemented Interfaces:
Divinity
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlockLevelUp, BlockSelectionWhenHigher, BlockWinOnPerimeter, BuildBeforeAndAfter, BuildDomeEverywhere, BuildTwice, BuildUnderYourself, Check5CompleteTowerWinCondition, MoveMultipleTimes, MoveOnOpponent, SetEffectOnOpponent, WinByDropTwoLevel
public class DivinityDecoratorWithEffects
extends java.lang.Object
implements Divinity
General class to decorate a divinity with special effects in accordance to Decorator Pattern. All methods are overridden and a setup for the decoration shell is declared.
